location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/85 'Bushire: protection of Norwegian interests by British Consul-General'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the protection of Norwegian consular interests at Bushire by the British Consul-General at Bushire.The file is composed of correspondence between the Foreign Office and the Secretary of State for India and contains the translation of a letter from the Royal Norwegian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Royal Norwegian Ministry of Foreign Affairs
